//form_validation Username cannot be empty! Username must be at least 3 characters! Username maximum 15 characters! Usernames can only consist of letters, numbers, ( . ) and ( _ ) !
Email cannot be empty! Invalid email address!
Name cannot be empty! Name must be at least 3 characters! Names can only contain letters and spaces!
Password cannot be empty! Password must be at least 8 characters! Passwords must have at least one uppercase letter! Passwords must have at least one lowercase letter! Passwords must have at least one number!
